questions.question: What does the 4th of July commemorate?

choices.answer: The end of World War I
The adopting of the Declaration of Independence

questions.question: What did the Declaration of Independence do?

choices.answer: It established a brand new colony for America
It announced our break from Great Britain & the birth of USA
It ended slavery in the North and granted equal rights
It said that George Washington was the supreme leader of USA

questions.question: What event immediately followed the adoption of the Declaration of Independence
Which of the following was not a signer of the Declaration of Independence?
Why did George Washington not sign the Declaration of Independence?

choices.answer: He was busy on business in Europe
He was preparing the Continental Army
He showed up to the convention late

questions.question: Where was the Declaration of Independence signed?
What major sports team gets its name from the 4th of July?
How was signing the Declaration of Independence dangerous?

choices.answer: You could be shot for doing so
It was considered treason against the King
The declaration was located in a hostile place
Nicholas Cage wanted it for himself

questions.question: Who was the primary author of the Declaration of Independence?
From what movement did Jefferson take many of his ideas in writing the document?
Many of the Enlightenment Ideas focused on

choices.answer: The relationship between governments and "The People"

questions.question: Which of these ideas is not in the Declaration of Independence?

choices.answer: The people have a right to rebel
Government are meant to protect people's rights

questions.question: The idea that government should protect ppl's rights in exchange for something from the ppl. is
One way that the people uphold social contract theory today is

choices.answer: we pay taxes to the government
the government pays for public school

questions.question: The idea that the should people have power in the government is called
Popular sovereignty is in the DOI and is the foundation of
One way that popular sovereignty exists is

choices.answer: we vote for our leaders in elections

questions.question: The Declaration of Independence has no legal power today, but is symbolic in that it

choices.answer: Created the structure of our government
Outlines what an ideal government should do
Speaks out against the injustice of slavery
Outlines what an effective army should do

questions.question: When the DOI says: "governments are instituted among men...", it means

choices.answer: A king is an ideal ruler
The people should choose their leaders
The USA should have a president

questions.question: When the DOI says, "all men...are endowed by their creator with...unalienable rights," it means

choices.answer: Parents should give their children certain things
Governments should give their people certain things
People are born with certain things guaranteed

questions.question: When the DOI says, " we...are Absolved from all Allegiance to the British Crown," it means

choices.answer: The King has no more power over us
We owe something from the king

questions.question: When the DOI says, "we, by Authority of the good People of these Colonies," it means

choices.answer: "The People" authorize the signers of this document
The colonies are better than Britain

questions.question: The signers of the DOI are considered _______ of the people of the colonies
When the DOI says, "we...are, and of Right ought to be Free and Independent States," it means

choices.answer: The colonies are now a country
The colonies have a new king
The colonies should be free but aren't

questions.question: "FOUNDING" in "Founding Fathers" refers to the fact that the signers and others at that time

choices.answer: Took steps to create this country
Won a very important war against Britain
Found great ideas that still help us today

questions.question: Another name for the 4th of July is
Overall the Fourth of July is a holiday that celebrates all of the following EXCEPT

choices.answer: The freedom of our people from tyranny
